Cafe Pap is that place where you can grab a quick coffee breakfast, come back for a light lunch and then after work, you and your friends can enjoy a fresh Cappuccino with a pastry. With its well organised indoor sitting area with comfortable wooden seats, cafe pap is a go to place when you need it coffee espresso.
